com.w2.api.engine.components.commands

Class EyeRing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w2.api.engine.components.commands.EyeRing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotCommand, RobotComponent

    public final class EyeRing
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotCommand
    `EyeRing` object instruct a `Robot` how to display its eye pattern.

    For ledBitmap, the mapping represents an analog clock, where index 0 represents the light at 12 o'clock, index 1 represents the light at 1 o'clock, index 2 represents the light at 2 o'clock, and so on.

      • setBrightness

        public void setBrightness(double brightness)
        Set the normalized brightness value of the light
        Parameters:
        brightness - a value between RobotComponentConstants.BRIGHTNESS_MIN and RobotComponentConstants.BRIGHTNESS_MAX. Out of bound values may cause unpredictable results.

      • setLedValue

        public void setLedValue(int index,
               boolean on)
        Sets the index of the ledBitmap to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the light position. If index is out of bound (index >= ledCount), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        on - The boolean value that specifies whether the light is on.

      • getLedValue

        public boolean getLedValue(int index)
        Returns the led value at the specified index. If index is out of bound (index >= ledCount), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the light position.
        Returns:
        The boolean value that specifies whether the light is on.

      • setAllLeds

        public void setAllLeds(boolean on)
        Convenience method that sets all the lights to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        on - The boolean value that specifies if the light should be on.
